text:
@10DowningStreet @BorisJohnson Great.

Today should have been our wedding day, yet all I’ve read this morning is how pubs and restaurants can re open from 4th July. Not a single word on weddings! @GOVUK @Number10press @10DowningStreet @BorisJohnson @UKgovcomms #wedding #weddings #coronavirus #SaturdayThoughts
